title: BioShock: Wet and Wild Fun!
description: Would you kindly join The Besties as they revisit the dystopian RPG shooter BioShock? Together they discuss the influence of Objectivism and environmentalism on its storytelling. The design aesthetic that incorporates Art Deco and steampunk. And critique the effectiveness of the plot twist (spoiler alert!)
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
